sections.description:
WA Timetable is a lightweight and user-friendly WordPress plugin designed to display stylish timetables on your website. Whether you're a sports fan or a professional event organizer, this plugin provides a simple way to showcase schedules and events in a clear, accessible format.

Features
  • Fully Responsive: Timetables look great on any device, from desktop computers to mobile phones.
  • Customizable: Easily change the look and feel of your timetable to match your website's theme via the plugin settings.
  • Shortcode Integration: Simply use a shortcode to embed the timetable on any page or post.

sections.changelog:
3.0.0

  • This is a major release combining all previous updates into a single, cohesive version.
  • Major refactoring and reorganization of the core CSS file for better readability and maintainability.
  • Added a new 'TODAY' label for the current day's tab in the timetable navigation.
  • Fixed bugs related to incorrect timezone conversions, mobile device display issues, and incorrect session status when all nested units had published results.
  • Improved the parsing logic for timetable data to handle various event formats more reliably, including grouped qualification events.
  • Updated the plugin's core functionality to use a more efficient data fetching method.
  • Corrected

errors by fixing object-to-array conversion issues and resolving issues with the GitHub updater class.
  • Refined the responsive design to ensure the timetable adapts seamlessly to all screen sizes.
  • Added a settings page for customization of timezones and session names.
  • Timetable data is now fetched and parsed dynamically from the official website.
